definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: Pregame warming-up practice on shooting! It does help.
sentences.chinese: 賽前準備活動投籃練習，是很有幫助的。

sentences.english: I would recite all that had been rehearsed on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 我會把在回家路上練習過的東西背誦一遍。

sentences.english: Two special units focusing on initial and final consonant clusters.
sentences.chinese: 包含兩個特別的單元，提供字首與字尾子音羣的練習。

sentences.english: Do the five or fifty and find out what it's talking about.
sentences.chinese: 請做那5或50的練習，並找出它所談論的事物。

sentences.english: Most likely, these folks were engaging in their morningqigong.
sentences.chinese: 這些人極有可能在練習氣功。

sentences.english: We are practising backhand topspin and backspin serves.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在練習反手推擋。

sentences.english: Exercises follow each chapter, with hints and answers supplied.
sentences.chinese: 練習跟隨每章，帶有暗示和答案提供。

sentences.english: I differentiate the two by the simple practice of hand-coding.
sentences.chinese: 我是通過簡單的手編程序的簡單練習來區別兩者的。

sentences.english: She also practices boxing, planting vegetables on her roof garden, and cooks all by herself.
sentences.chinese: 她還練習拳擊，在屋頂花園種蔬菜，自己做飯。

sentences.english: A practitioner surnamed Zheng, from a county of Heilongjiang, still practices Falun Gong secretly.
sentences.chinese: 一名來自黑龍江某縣姓鄭的練習者仍然在祕密練功。

sentences.english: I practiced facial expressions, and I snarled like a wolf.
sentences.chinese: 我練習面部表情，方法是學習狼嚎。

sentences.english: One book is available for each level of GFI.
sentences.chinese: 每個等級都配有一本練習冊。

sentences.english: AIt’s really good. How do you practice?
sentences.chinese: A你的英語真的很好。你怎麼練習的？

sentences.english: I practice it in the shower when nobody's listening.
sentences.chinese: 我在沖澡的時候練習，周圍沒有人聽。

sentences.english: Over there, a man performed the slow-motion dance of tai chi.
sentences.chinese: 那邊，一個男人在練習動作舒緩的太極。

definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk
to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
